dialogues.text: Excuse me, could I have a moment of your time?

options.text: Who are you and what do you want?
I don't have time for this.

dialogues.text: Thank you. I'm desperately seeking help to find my son's lost toy. It's the only thing he had with him when he disappeared. Please, can you help me find it? I believe it holds the key to bringing him back.

options.text: Of course, I'll do my best to help.
I'm sorry, but I can't help you right now.

dialogues.text: Please, I beg of you. My son's toy is the only thing he had with him when he disappeared. I believe it holds the key to bringing him back. Please, can you help me find it?

options.text: I'll do my best to help.
I'm sorry, but I can't help you right now.
Your son's toy is not my problem.

dialogues.text: Oh, thank you so much! Please, search high and low. I'll be forever grateful if you can find it.
I understand. If you change your mind, please let me know. My son's happiness depends on finding that toy.
How can you be so heartless? You deserve to be lost and alone, just like my son. I hope you never find your way back.
